Chinese: 图片的<above, below, left or right>的建筑物是<landmark_building/attraction>吗？
这张图中的地标属于<city/country>吗？
English: Is the building <above, below, left or right> in the picture <landmark_building/attraction>?
Is the building in the picture <landmark_building/attraction>?
Does the landmark in this picture belong to <city/country>?

Chinese: 这个照片显示的是哪个<标志性建筑/景点>？
请指定此处显示的<标志性建筑/景点>的名称。
位于图片<above, below, left or right of the image>的<标志性建筑/景点>是什么？
这张图中的<标志性建筑/景点>属于哪个<城市/国家>？
请简要介绍一下图中的<标志性建筑/景点>。
English: Please specify the name of the <landmark_building/attraction> shown here.
What is the <landmark_building/attraction> located <above, below, left or right of the image>?
Which <city/country> does the <landmark_building/attraction> in this picture belong to?
Please briefly introduce the <landmark_building/attraction> in the picture.

Chinese: 这个照片显示的是哪个<标志性建筑/景点>？
请指定此处显示的<标志性建筑/景点>的名称。

请简要介绍一下图中的<标志性建筑/景点>。
English: Please specify the name of the <landmark_building/attraction> shown here.
What is the <landmark_building/attraction> located <above, below, left or right of the image>?
Which <city/country> does the <landmark_building/attraction> in this picture belong to?
Please briefly introduce the <landmark_building/attraction> in the picture.
